verbose_text: Daily subcutaneous injections of PTH stimulates more osteogenesis than bone resorption by directly acting on osteoblasts to promote osteoblastogenesis and reduce osteoblast apoptosis [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: PTH stimulates more osteogenesis than bone resorption by directly acting on osteoblasts to promote osteoblastogenesis and reduce osteoblast apoptosis
